document.full_text: los angeles lakers forward derrick caracter was arrested for drunkenness and allegedly shoving a cashier after being refused service at a pancake restaurant in new orleans, police said on monday.
document.title: derrick caracter arrested for alleged battery at pancake house
lines_and_colors: los angeles lakers forward derrick caracter was arrested for drunkenness and allegedly shoving a cashier after being refused service at a pancake restaurant in new orleans, police said on monday.
